_sText:
After 2 years I fixed this map. For me this map is a failure, but some people like it, I fixed map for them. I'm not going to edit/update this map anymore!


Credits

Filo (a.k.a. Fighter) - map creator

Models - I don't know who made them, I found them on other site.

Glaber - E-123 Omega Model

phqnix - textures


Special thanks:

Berklej and Carlos Olivera  - thanks for testing map

Metz10 - thanks for help with adding content to .BSP


E-mail: defenderpl@gazeta.pl
